sentences.sContent: My younger sister is a belle, everyone likes her!
sentences.sContent_eng: My younger sister is a belle, everyone likes her!
sentences.sCn: 我妹妹是个美女，每个人都喜欢她！

sentences.sContent: The boots with various design makes us dazzling, wear fashionably build the modern belle that helps you make spring.
sentences.sContent_eng: The boots with various design makes us dazzling, wear fashionably build the modern belle that helps you make spring.
sentences.sCn: 款式繁多的靴子让我们眼花缭乱，入时的穿搭帮你成为春季的时髦美女。

remMethod.val: 有一个鞋子的品牌就是百丽 (BELLE) → 美女爱买名牌鞋子
